mapper.select: SELECT /* contenstQuery.listByCategory */ A.CONTENTS_ID ,A.CONTENTS_NM ,(SELECT CONTENTS_SERIES_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS_SERIES WHERE CONTENTS_SERIES_ID = A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID) AS SERIES_NM ,(SELECT BRAND_NM FROM BG_BRAND WHERE BRAND_ID = (SELECT BRAND_ID FROM BG_CONTENTS_SERIES WHERE CONTENTS_SERIES_ID = A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID)) AS BRAND_NM , BCCR.ORDERING_NO FROM BG_CONTENTS A, BG_CATE_CONTENTS_RELATIONSHIPS BCCR WHERE 1=1 AND DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND A.CONTENTS_ID = BCCR.CONTENTS_ID AND BCCR.CATE_ID = #{categoryId} ORDER BY BCCR.ORDERING_NO ASC, A.CONTENTS_ID DESC

SELECT /* contenstQuery.totalCount */ count(*) FROM BG_CONTENTS WHERE 1=1
AND CONTENTS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

SELECT /* contenstQuery.detail */ A.CONTENTS_NM , A.CONTENTS_ID , A.CONTENTS_DESC , A.SRC_PATH , A.IMG_PATH , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT , A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID
,(SELECT CONTENTS_SERIES_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS_SERIES WHERE CONTENTS_SERIES_ID = A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID) AS SERIES_NM ,(SELECT BRAND_NM FROM BG_BRAND WHERE BRAND_ID = (SELECT BRAND_ID FROM BG_CONTENTS_SERIES WHERE CONTENTS_SERIES_ID = A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID)) AS BRAND_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS A WHERE CONTENTS_ID = #{contents_id} ORDER BY CONTENTS_ID DESC
